attributes.action: Make a ‘5D’ film and TV show experience including a headset to watch
attributes.additional_details:
You can choose which character you want to be but you just watch it you don’t play and you don’t have to do anything 
Personally I would love for that to be a thing and you could be the character that you choose for the whole film or TV show.
attributes.background:
In films or tv shows imagine if you could be the POV of one of the characters in that film or tv show 
So you’d be able to see out of the eyes of that character kind of like a VR thing
For example the film Uncharted imagine if you could see the POV of the characters

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Investing in new technologies is a matter for private enterprises, not the UK Government or Parliament.
